body.p: In our example, we follow the scenario "extract and write product information to a file", which consists of these steps:

ol.li: Navigate to the application under test (AUT) - the Katalon Zack Market page: https://demo-store.katalon.com/.
On the item page, get the name and price of the selected item.
Write the name and price information to a CSV file.

body.p: The item page displays the item with name and price as follows:
We can use Katalon Recorder to first extract and store the item name and price. Then with the appendToCSV command, we can append the extracted data to a CSV file.
